pages.title: Logic Link
pages.text: The central hub peripheral for $(thing)CreateLogicLink$(). Connects a CC:Tweaked computer to a Create logistics network for inventory access, item requests, and wireless device control.$(br2)Peripheral type: $(thing)"logiclink"$()

$(bold)Linking:$() Right-click the Logic Link $(italic)item$() on any Create linked block (Stock Link, Package Link, etc.) to copy the network frequency. Then place it next to a CC:Tweaked computer. Right-click in air to clear the stored frequency. Sneak+right-click to place without linking.

pages.title: Network Status
pages.text: $(li)$(thing)isLinked()$() → boolean — connected to network?$(br)$(li)$(thing)getPosition()$() → {x, y, z}$(br)$(li)$(thing)getNetworkID()$() → string or nil$(br)$(li)$(thing)getNetworkInfo()$() → {linked, networkId, position, itemTypes, totalItems}$(br)$(li)$(thing)refresh()$() — force cache update$(br2)$(bold)Example:$()$(br)$(#4488CC)local link = peripheral.find("logiclink")$(br)local info = link.getNetworkInfo()$(br)print("Linked: " .. tostring(info.linked))$(br)print("Items: " .. info.totalItems)$()

pages.title: Inventory Methods
pages.text: $(li)$(thing)list()$() → [{name, count, displayName}] — all items on network$(br)$(li)$(thing)getItemCount(name)$() → int — count by registry name$(br)$(li)$(thing)getItemTypeCount()$() → int — distinct item types$(br)$(li)$(thing)getTotalItemCount()$() → int — sum of all counts$(br2)$(bold)Example:$()$(br)$(#4488CC)local items = link.list()$(br)for _, item in ipairs(items) do$(br)  print(item.displayName .. ": " .. item.count)$(br)end$()

pages.title: Logistics Data
pages.text: $(li)$(thing)getGauges()$() → [{item, itemDisplayName, targetAmount, currentStock, promised, satisfied, address, slot, position}]$(br)$(li)$(thing)getLinks()$() → [{x, y, z, type, redstonePower}]$(br)$(li)$(thing)getSensors()$() → [{position, targetPosition, data}]$(br2)$(bold)Item Requests$()$(br)$(li)$(thing)requestItem(name, count, address)$() → boolean$(br)$(li)$(thing)requestItems(items, address)$() → boolean$(br2)$(#4488CC)link.requestItem("minecraft:iron_ingot", 64, "Smeltery")$()

pages.title: Wireless Hub
pages.text: The Logic Link doubles as a $(thing)wireless hub$(), discovering nearby LogicLink devices without wires.$(br2)$(li)$(thing)getDevices()$() → [{id, type, label, position, distance, dimension}]$(br)$(li)$(thing)getHubRange()$() → int (default 64, max 256)$(br)$(li)$(thing)setHubRange(range)$()$(br)$(li)$(thing)setDeviceLabel(id, label)$()$(br)$(li)$(thing)getDeviceLabel(id)$() → string$(br2)$(#4488CC)local devs = link.getDevices()$(br)for _, d in ipairs(devs) do$(br)  print(d.id .. " [" .. d.type .. "]")$(br)end$()

pages.title: Remote Sensors
pages.text: Read data from sensors discovered by the hub:$(br2)$(li)$(thing)getRemoteSensorData(id)$() → sensor data or nil$(br)$(li)$(thing)getAllRemoteSensorData()$() → all sensor data$(br)$(li)$(thing)cycleTrackSwitch(sensorId)$() → boolean$(br)$(li)$(thing)getTrackSwitchState(sensorId)$() → state info or nil$(br)$(li)$(thing)getTrainBlockData(sensorId)$() → station/signal/observer data$(br2)$(#4488CC)local data = link.getRemoteSensorData("sensor_0")$(br)if data then print(data.data.speed) end$()

pages.title: Remote Motor / Drive
pages.text: Control motors and drives over the hub:$(br2)$(li)$(thing)enableRemote(id, enabled)$() — enable/disable$(br)$(li)$(thing)setRemoteSpeed(id, speed)$() — motor speed$(br)$(li)$(thing)setRemoteModifier(id, modifier)$() — drive modifier$(br)$(li)$(thing)setRemoteReversed(id, reversed)$() — drive reverse$(br)$(li)$(thing)getRemoteMotorInfo(id)$() → {type, enabled, speed, stress, sequence}$(br2)$(#4488CC)link.setRemoteSpeed("motor_0", 128)$(br)link.enableRemote("motor_0", true)$()

pages.title: Remote Redstone
pages.text: Control Redstone Controllers over the hub:$(br2)$(li)$(thing)setRemoteRedstoneOutput(id, item1, item2, power)$()$(br)$(li)$(thing)getRemoteRedstoneInput(id, item1, item2)$() → int$(br)$(li)$(thing)getRemoteRedstoneChannels(id)$() → [{item1, item2, mode, power}]$(br)$(li)$(thing)setAllRemoteRedstoneOutputs(id, power)$()$(br2)$(#4488CC)link.setRemoteRedstoneOutput("rc_0",$(br)  "minecraft:redstone",$(br)  "minecraft:redstone", 15)$()
